description: This script collects and logs various security and system status information related to device security features, including checks for enabled protections, agent user, MAC addresses, and various security configurations, then logs this telemetry data.

methods.name: check_status
methods.description: Main function that checks various system security configurations and logs corresponding telemetry data.

methods.name: print_telemetry_log
methods.description: Helper function to check if a string exists in a file and append it if not, used for logging telemetry data.
